prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Reed, Piano, Guitar, Brass, Bass, but without Drums.
captions:
Style 1: Reed, Piano, Guitar, Brass, Bass - no Drums in this song.

Style 2: This song features Reed, Piano, Guitar, Brass, and Bass, but no Drums.
